[[Image:Paula Katherine Marmor.jpg|frame]]
'''Paula Katherine Marmor''' (born [[1950]]) was the founding editor of ''[[Parma Eldalamberon]]'' in its first run.

A native of California, Paula Marmor lives in the [[wikipedia:San Fernando Valley|San Fernando Valley]] and works with design and media.
